panels.description: vouch_ready is set to 1 when Vouch is ready to start attesting, and 0 otherwise. If this number stays at 0 it implies a configuration or connection issue that should be addressed
panels.title: Vouch Status

panels.description:
The number of accounts actively managed by Vouch, broken down by the validator's state.

Note: Unknown accounts are those that Vouch can see in configuration, but cannot be seen on the beacon chain.
panels.title: Validating accounts

panels.description: The version of Vouch.
panels.title: Vouch Version

panels.description: The number of validators currently in the sync committee.
panels.title: Sync Committee Validators

panels.description: Number of beacon clients used for multi-connection strategy on main actions.
panels.title: Active Multi Clients for Main

panels.description: Number of beacon clients used for multi-connection strategy on event actions.
panels.title: Active Multi Clients for Events

panels.description: The latest slot for which Vouch proposed.
panels.title: Latest proposal slot

panels.description: The latest slot for which Vouch attested.
panels.title: Latest attestation slot

panels.description: The latest slot for which Vouch produced an aggregate attestation.
panels.title: Latest attestation aggregate slot

panels.description: The latest slot for which Vouch presented proposal preparations.
panels.title: Latest proposal preparation slot

panels.description: The latest slot for which Vouch created a sync committee message.
panels.title: Latest sync committee message slot

panels.description: The latest slot for which Vouch created a sync committee aggregate.
panels.title: Latest sync committee aggregation slot

panels.description: Percentage increase in success operations by operation type and provider.
panels.title: Client operations succeeded

panels.description: Increase in failed operations by operation type and provider.
panels.title: Client operations failed

panels.description: Increase in successes of individual Vouch processes.
panels.title: Process request successes

panels.description: Increase in failures of individual Vouch processes.
panels.title: Process request failures

panels.description:
A subscriber is a particular combination of slot and committee for which Vouch requires a network subscription.

An aggregator is a particular combination of slot and committee for which Vouch is acting as an attestation aggregator.
panels.title: Beacon committee subscribers and aggregators

panels.description: A subscriber is a particular combination of slot and committee for which Vouch requires a network subscription.
panels.title: Sync committee subscribers

panels.description: The ratio of included to possible attestations in the aggregate.
panels.title: Attestation aggregate coverage ratio

panels.description: The ratio of included to possible messages in the aggregate.
panels.title: Sync committee aggregate coverage ratio

panels.description: The number of beacon block proposals by method type.
panels.title: Beacon block proposals

panels.description: Percentage of failures of provider requests.
panels.title: Provider failures

panels.description: The time that Vouch takes to carry out beacon committee subscriptions, measured from the time it starts the subscription process to the time it hands off the subscriptions  to be submitted to the beacon nodes.
panels.title: Beacon subscription process duration

panels.description: The time that Vouch takes to prepare proposals, measured from the time it starts the proposal preparation process to the time it hands off the proposal preparation to be submitted to the beacon nodes.
panels.title: Proposal preparation process duration

panels.description: The time that Vouch takes to carry out proposals, measured from the time it starts the proposal process to the time it hands off the proposal to be submitted to the beacon nodes.
panels.title: Proposal process duration

panels.description: The time that Vouch takes to carry out attestations, measured from the time it starts the attestation process to the time it hands off the attestation to be submitted to the beacon nodes.
panels.title: Attestation process duration

panels.description: The time that Vouch takes to carry out attestation aggregations, measured from the time it starts the aggregation process to the time it hands off the attestation aggregate to be submitted to the beacon nodes.
panels.title: Attestation aggregate process duration

panels.description: The time that Vouch takes to carry out sync committee subscriptions, measured from the time it starts the subscription process to the time it hands off the subscriptions  to be submitted to the beacon nodes.
panels.title: Sync committee subscription process duration

panels.description: The time that Vouch takes to carry out sync committee messages, measured from the time it starts the message process to the time it hands off the sync committee messages to be submitted to the beacon nodes.
panels.title: Sync committee message process duration

panels.description: The time that Vouch takes to carry out sync committee aggregations, measured from the time it starts the aggregation process to the time it hands off the sync aggregate to be submitted to the beacon nodes.
panels.title: Sync committee aggregate process duration

panels.description: The absolute bid delta obtained by deadline strategy (ETH).
panels.title: Builder bid absolute delta (ETH)

panels.description: The percentage bid delta obtained by deadline strategy.
panels.title: Builder bid percentage delta

panels.description: The time vouch spends in the auction block operation.
panels.title: Relay auction block duration

panels.description: The time vouch spends in the builder bid operation.
panels.title: Relay builder bid duration

panels.description: The number of relays that returned the best bid
panels.title: Best bid number of relays

panels.description: The time vouch spends in the validator registrations operation.
panels.title: Relay validator registrations

panels.description: The time vouch spends in the execution config operation.
panels.title: Relay execution config duration

panels.description: The time in to the slot where the beacon block proposal was broadcast.
panels.title: Block proposal mark

panels.description: The time in to the slot where the attestation was broadcast.
panels.title: Attestation mark

panels.description: The time in to the slot where the sync committee messages were broadcast.
panels.title: Sync committee message mark

panels.description: The time in to the slot where the aggregate attestations were broadcast.
panels.title: Aggregate attestation mark

panels.description: The time in to the slot where the sync committee aggregates were broadcast.
panels.title: Sync committee aggregate mark

panels.description: The time from the start of a slot to the block for that slot being received by Vouch.
panels.title: Block receipt delay

panels.description: The time taken for the provider to respond with a beacon block proposal.
panels.title: Beacon block proposal time

panels.description: The time taken for the providers to accept a submission for a beacon block.
panels.title: Beacon block submission time

panels.description: The time taken for the providers to return data for an attestation.
panels.title: Attestation data time

panels.description: The time taken for the providers to accept a submission for an attestation.
panels.title: Attestation data submission time

panels.description: The time taken for the providers to respond with an aggregate attestation.
panels.title: Attestation aggregation time

panels.description: The time taken for the providers to accept a submission for an aggregate attestation.
panels.title: Attestation aggregation submission time

panels.description: The time vouch spends from starting the beacon committee subscription process up to and including submitting the subscription request.
panels.title: Beacon committee subscription time

panels.description: The time taken for the providers to accept a submission for a beacon committee subscription.
panels.title: Beacon committee subscription submission time

panels.description: The time vouch spends from starting the sync committee message process up to and including submitting the sync committee messages.
panels.title: Sync committee messages time

panels.description: The time taken for the providers to accept a submission for sync committee messages.
panels.title: Sync committee message submission time

panels.description: The time vouch spends from starting the sync committee aggregation process up to and including submitting the sync committee aggregations.
panels.title: Sync committee aggregation time

panels.description: The time taken for the providers to accept a submission for sync committee contributions and proofs.

targets.expr: sum(increase(vouch_client_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{instance="$instance",operation="submit sync committee contribution and proofs"}[$__interval])) by (le)

panels.title: Sync committee contribution and proofs submission time

panels.description: Cumulative total of sync committee submissions included and missing from the SyncAggregate.
panels.title: % of Sync Committee Included in SyncAggregate
% of Missing from SyncAggregate excluding mismatches

targets.expr: (sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_mismatches_total{instance="$instance"}) OR on() vector(0)) / (sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_found_total{instance="$instance"}) + sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_missing_total{instance="$instance"}) + (sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_mismatches_total{instance="$instance"}) OR on() vector(0)))

(sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_missing_total{instance="$instance"}) + (sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_mismatches_total{instance="$instance"}) OR on() vector(0))) / (sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_found_total{instance="$instance"}) + sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_missing_total{instance="$instance"}) + (sum(vouch_synccommitteeverification_mismatches_total{instance="$instance"}) OR on() vector(0)))
